title: Award
text:
2019: Geoscience Climbing Scholarship, USTC.
2018: National Encouragement Scholarship, USTC.
2018: Physics Innovation Research Experimental Paper Competition Special Award, USTC.
2018: Alumni Awards Scholarship, USTC.
2017: National Encouragement Scholarship, USTC.

title: Kang Liang
text:
Kang Liang is currently a PhD student in Southern Methodist University advised by Prof. Zhong Lu from fall 2020.
He has a passion for developing InSAR technique, applying it to further understanding and characterizing geodynamic phenomena(e.g. Landslide). He is alse interested in machine learning and try to combine it with his work.
He is a hardcore fan of Rock & Roll. His favorite musician is Cui Jian and Bon Jovi.
